actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to remove an inequity by allowing the same investment tax credit for certain tangible property used as an integral part of retail or wholesale trade as is allowed for such property used in manufacturing and other certain businesses.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend the investment tax credit to tangible property used as an integral part of a retail or wholesale trade.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to remove an inequity by allowing the same investment tax credit for certain tangible property used as an integral part of retail or wholesale trade as is allowed for such property used in manufacturing and other certain businesses.
